overview: In May, four red hairballs play in front of the burrow. What fate does the mountain have in store for these young foxes? Will they survive the multiple dangers that threaten them? And above all, who is this animal with hyper-sharp senses that seems to adapt to all situations? Let's leave the path of men and their prejudices to follow the discreet trail of the fox in the heart of the Alps.
tagline: The life of four foxes in the Alps
title: The Beautiful Opportunist
